Title: Announcing general availability of Mobile Services .NET support
Summary: We are proud this week to announce general availability of the Mobile Services .NET backend, which enables you to write your services using the power of ASP.NET Web API and your favorite .NET language.
Content:
We are proud this week to announce general availability of the Mobile Services .NET backend, which enables you to write your services using the power of ASP.NET Web API and your favorite .NET language. Mobile Services lets you add a cloud-hosted backend to your mobile app and quickly light up functionality such as data storage, authentication, and scalable push notifications. For more information, check out the announcement blog post from Scott Guthrie, as well as the following resources:
  • Blog post: Azure Mobile Services: why should ASP.NET developers care?
  • Blog post: Offline Sync for Mobile Services
  • New Mobile Services documentation page
